parse: Conjunctive waw | Verb - Qal - Consecutive imperfect - third person masculine plural
str2: To pull up, the tent-pins, start on a, journey
Hashmonah -- a place in the southern desert

parse: Conjunctive waw | Verb - Qal - Consecutive imperfect - third person masculine plural
str2: To incline, to decline, to pitch a, tent, gen, to encamp
Moseroth -- a place in the wilderness where Aaron died
